title: BioBistro at LPG Biomarkt Kollwitzstrasse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Buffet, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic bistro attached to the organic LPG supermarket in Prenzlauer Berg. Serve-yourself canteen, with some 6-8 dishes a day, of which at least one is clearly marked as vegan. Also has salads, soups, and other things.
